page.title: 07DENBURY SCHOOL MAY DAY
page.content:
On Saturday we went to the school where there was a May Fair.There were lots of things going on,like netball and funny football, maypole dancing, country dancing and other games. You could pay about 5p a go and see if you could win back more money than when you paid.We played netball against the mums and they won. The football was played by the boys against the dads and the boys won. There were things to eat like cakes and hotdogs,sandwiches etc.There were also some contests.One of them was to guess how many ballons there were in the car.When they found out who the winner was they let all the ballons go!
Geraldine Tull and Sarah Stonelake Age 11 and 10
